job_tasks.phrase: translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of taking new technologies (in this case, generative AI) and building them into a functional product for end-users.

job_tasks.phrase: work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the collaborative software development process, focusing on building prototypes as part of a multidisciplinary team.

job_tasks.phrase: be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery
job_tasks.justification: This describes a pragmatic approach to software development, prioritizing speed and testability over immediate perfection, a common practice in early-stage product development.
This refers to the agile software development practice of refining existing solutions based on feedback, a core part of the software lifecycle.
This explicitly mentions core software engineering tasks related to building the server-side logic and interfaces of an application.

job_tasks.phrase: building a new product from scratch
job_tasks.justification: This describes a fundamental software development activity: creating a new application from the ground up.
This refers to the ongoing maintenance and enhancement of software, a key aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the use and application of generative AI technologies, which falls under the specialization of AI/ML model work, even if the developer's primary role is integration.

job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare providers in their logistical processes
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business problem the product aims to solve, indicating a need for understanding the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare workers with logistical challenges
job_tasks.justification: This further elaborates on the business problem and the target users, requiring business understanding to effectively address their needs.

job_tasks.phrase: form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products
job_tasks.justification: This points to a strategic, long-term vision for the product and technology adoption, requiring business strategy alignment.

soft_skills.phrase: willingness to learn and implement new technologies
Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.
work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members
Your team is a multidisciplinary product team

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes traditional software development tasks such as building products from scratch, developing prototypes, backend and API development, and iterative improvement. While it mentions leveraging generative AI and conversational agents, the core responsibility is to integrate these technologies into a user-friendly product. The role is primarily focused on the software engineering aspect (Macro-Category A) with AI/ML as a component being integrated, rather than deep model development or specialization (Macro-Category B). Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development responsibilities and mentions the use of generative AI as a feature to be integrated. It lacks specific details on the AI/ML models themselves or advanced AI tasks, which makes it less ambiguous for classification. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the extent of 'leveraging new technologies' could be interpreted in slightly different ways, though the emphasis remains on product development.
